name: Cherry London
tagline: At Cherry, we believe in people ideas.
description:
Cherry London is one of Europe’s fastest growing marketing agencies specialising in strategic brand partnerships. 
As an independent agency reinventing marketing in the 21st century, Cherry helps brand marketers change their business and brand fortunes through strategic alliances, brand activation, commercial partnerships, brand strategy, loyalty and reward programmes and customer acquisition. Delivering real return on investment for companies.
